title: BARD - Cherry on the Sundae
itunes:title: BARD - Cherry on the Sundae
description:
Adam and Mark open the show discussing the various people who have gone by 'The Duke' over the years before quickly pivoting to the insanity going on at Los Angeles City Council Meetings. They also discuss Gavin Newsom's announcement that he is ending California's state of emergency...next February. As the show wraps up they discuss John Durham's loss in court as he attempted to prosecute Igor Danchenko

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
